website_summaries.verdict: An innovative design that keeps bedding in place. The raised rim and coated top keep everything where it should be until morning.
pros: Raised pillowstop and side edges keeps pillows and blankets in place
PillowStop design uses a raised head
AirTight system and Support Lock reinforced construction

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous air bed - I've had several guests (and pets) enjoy it! Does need to be refilled with air every few nights, but that's to be expected. I love the height! I've purchased a few cheap air beds and they always have trouble - this time I chose a trusted brand and I couldn't be happier! ----- If you found my review helpful, please click the "Yes" button below! :)
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Air Mattress
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have slept on this comfortably. There is little of the usual bouncing around with each movement. We have used it several times over the past few years. It's a nice height. The sheets stay on. The motorized pump is awesome. (We fill it up, then adjust for desired firmness after the user(s) lay down. Folds up easily(with help of reverse air pump) to fit in storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: TeachingMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Air Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Like the mattress but it has sprung some leaks (Exceeding the weight limit - Probable cause). Leaks were around round sections on mattress top. Fix was to let air out enough to stop air leaking out then applying super glue to hole and immediately toss on baking soda (does not take much) to create instant dry hard seal. Brush off or vacuum excess baking soda. repeat for next leak.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ross

customer_reviews.title: I can't BELIEVE I put a hole in it the first night!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Coleman? You guys put together a SUPER DUPER mattress! The VERY FIRST time I used this mattress I put a hole in it while inflating! I brought it over to a buddy's for the weekend; we're
customer_reviews.author: CurnoworNever

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy, but wouldn't hold air.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as an extra bed, when needed. It is very comfortable, but on the forth day, it started deflating and wouldn 't hold air. It would go down to where it was flat and unusable in about 15 minutes. I realize that anything that is meant to hold air or water are vulnerable to leaking. Good news is Amazon has a fantastic return policy and had me another one at my door in just a couple of days, just in time for Aunt Ruby to use. This one is just as comfortable and seems to be holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: The Banjo Picker.

customer_reviews.title: He said it was so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was a present for my son-in-law. He just took it on a camping trip and he raved about it. He said it was so easy to use. It not only inflates itself but deflates also. He didn't read the instructions, like most men, so he was surprised when he tried it out, that it did that. He has sleep problems so he slept well on it. Said it's going with him on every camping trip from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara g

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress with inflatable pump built in
customer_reviews.text: Great inflatable mattress. Plugged pump into the wall and worked great for inflating it fairly quickly, and when deflating, it sucked the remaining air out to make sure it could be folded up and stored flat. Held air for the two days we use the mattress, however, as the instructions say, after using it a few days it does need to be reinflated the first couple of times until the material has stretched properly..
customer_reviews.author: Tried the Product

customer_reviews.title: Developed a leak within a year
customer_reviews.text: I'd love to give this the 5 stars it deserves for comfort. And judging from other reviews, maybe I got the typical amount of use from it before it started leaking. Regardless, it's been used occasionally indoors for less than a year and now has developed a slow leak that requires re-inflation in the middle of the night. I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Jallope

customer_reviews.title: tried twice, failed twice, AFTER the return window.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second attempt to find a mattress like this that did not fail. We bought this and the SoundAsleep Dream Series Air Mattress with ComfortCoil Technology (see our other review). Both the Coleman and the SoundAsleep failed just AFTER the return window of 30 days. They both leak so badly they will not stay inflated, requires re-inflating more than once during the night. There is a design flaw in these beds that use the 'comfort coil' design where the internal straps connecting the top and bottom of the mattress eventually tear a hole where they are bonded to those surfaces. Daily use for greater than a month caused both our purchases to fail.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nye

customer_reviews.title: We checked the air intake and it was fine. Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our air bed a little over a year ago, we have only used it a few times, From the beginning it lost some air overnignt, but not so much that it was uncomfortable. I went to use it last night and after our guests were on it for an hour it had lost too much air to sleep on. We checked the air intake and it was fine. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made and flannel top! Easy inflate and deflate.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! Nieces came to visit and this inflated and deflated in just a few easy minutes! Perfect! We (adults) have yet to try it but it was great for the kids. The cord is not very long but you could bring an extension cord if need be. We used it in the living room this time so the cord was not an issue. Bed stayed inflated! We added air after the first initial fill up as suggested but this bed was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Itsallweird

customer_reviews.title: Product itself fine, very disappointed in amazon
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is fine, it’s a good quality blowup mattress...my issue is that my product was covered in Kohl’s labels and it appeared to be previously opened. There was no repair kit included lick other people have stated. When Amazon states they sell and ship it, there should be proper packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable and relaxing sleep for 2 or more people
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that this bed is amazing. It’s easily collapsible and stores quickly. We use this for all guests; however, lately we have been “camping” in our living room. It easily sleeps the 3 of us. I live that it has grooves along the outside that prevent us from falling off. After a complete night of sleeping we add a tad bit more air; however, that’s super easy. Just turn the dial and you are good to go. The entire thing inflated and deflated quickly with a turn of the button. One of the best products I have purchased from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C Rocko III

customer_reviews.title: One was perfect, but the other had a slow leak
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two mattresses for a condo we rarely visit. And we rarely had use for air mattresses. Last summer was the first time we actually used them. One was perfect, but the other had a slow leak. And it got to be a joke on who was to sleep on the “leaker”. These were children, all under 80 pounds, two to a mattress. I know Coleman guarantees satisfaction but since I had not had occasion to use them for well over a year, I just threw it away. My advice, always blow them up right away and try them out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: very loud pump
customer_reviews.text: received mine after purchasing from the Amazon Warehouse, plugged it in and ran the built-in inflator/pump. The pump is VERY Loud, this is why the 4 stars. Thank goodness it only takes 3 minutes to inflate. Once inflated it will stretch and soften up and lose some air, just hit the inflator again. It is 18" high so it lines up with most couch seats to create an even larger sleep area if needed. The top coating is nice and not that "flocked" stuff
customer_reviews.author: u/h2oguuy

customer_reviews.title: The included carrying case keeps it nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace our aging air mattress that the cat tried to climb. Only had to top it off once after initial inflation, and it stayed firm for over a week. We left it inflated while on vacation and over three weeks after initial inflation it had barely lost any air (<10sec of inflation to top it off). Deflating and packing was a breeze. The included carrying case keeps it nice and compact.
customer_reviews.author: I went on the internet, and I bought this...

customer_reviews.title: Better than the standard coleman
customer_reviews.text: We go camping all summer long and had a lot of different air mattresses over the years, the past 2 years we used the regular Coleman Double high and hated the fact that during the night, it lost just enough air that we would both roll into the middle. I'm not sure if this is because of the age or if this new version was done better (it's also double the price), but I don't feel that happening on this one so far. We'll see how I feel after a complete season next fall, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jesena

customer_reviews.title: Best air mattress I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air mattress to replace the exact same model (different color) that my cat had a little too much fun playing with. I love that the pump is built into the product, makes use even easier than having to hold the pump in place during inflation - well worth the extra money! I have a set of "deep" queen sized sheets that work great with this. Love, love, love this air mattress! Easily accommodates two full-sized adults without the need for re-inflation. Once you inflate it, wait about 10-15 minutes for it to "stretch" out, and then re-inflate if you/your guests prefer a very firm mattress. Sits high off the ground, which is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think this bed is pretty poorly made and i will be returning it
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it is getting hard to find an air bed that will blow up any other way then the 120v plug. When I saw this bed I was excited because it also has the manual blow up/deflate option. I got it home and have had it blown up for 2 days and it goes flat every hour or so. Sleep on it at night includes multiple time of adding air because it has deflated. I think this bed is pretty poorly made and i will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: joshua n. reinke

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with the quality of the mattress combined with the price tag. We've been using it for 8 sleeps..no kids or pets have been on it and still it split at a seem. We tried patching it but it's in an awkward spot so the patches don't hold with any amount of weight on the mattress. So so disappointed I should have just bought a cheapo one.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B.

customer_reviews.title: Made a Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: This Air Mattress turned out to be perfect for us and our guests. We have a small 2 bedroom home and this allow us to turn our "Den" (second bedroom) into a real bedroom. Our friends said it was very comfortable and it's height made them feel they were not on the floor. We added a mattress pad to give it more of a normal mattress feel.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Doty

customer_reviews.title: Mattress Only Lasted A Year
customer_reviews.text: This was a great mattress and I am supremely disappointed in it, as I had very high expectations for it. I have used this about six times over the last year and a half, storing it properly and using it according to the manual every single time. However, it now no longer holds air and will be almost half way deflated after an entire nights sleep. I am frustrated by this, as the mattress has only a sleeping weight of 190lbs at any given time. A mattress of this cost and made by Coleman should last a lot longer than mine did. Search elsewhere for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, returned the mattress
customer_reviews.text: I find it very sad as a person who grew up in Wichita KS, where Coleman started, that their products have become just another cheap Chinese import. The quality of the mattress was simply subpar in comparison with others in this price range and we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Only used 3 times and 3rd time went FLAT!
customer_reviews.text: Used twice for camping since purchase. Always in a tent not on the ground. Put away properly and well taken care of. Went to use it for the 3rd time and it deflated within hours. SUCKS WHEN ON A CAMPING TRIP! There is no punctures or holes.... seems to be a slow leak through a seam?!? Frustrating and I wish I could contact Seller directly as this is BS. I WOULD NOT SUGGEST ANYONE TO PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: Bandit

customer_reviews.title: The perfect guest bed for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: At last, due to the height of the bed, a graceful exit from an inflatable mattress is possible! The perfect guest bed for small spaces. Love the rapidity with which it filled (less than 5 minutes). I left it inflated for a week, it held the firmness with minimal softening, which was expected due to stretching of the material. Using the pump in either inflate or deflate mode it is possible to make minute adjustments to firmness quite easily. Using the release valve and then the pump to remove the remaining air, it was easy to fold and to get it back into the 15"x18"x5" zippered storage bag. Would definitely recommend,
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Bad motor
customer_reviews.text: I used once and the air mattress worked just fine. The second time I used it, the motor burned out about halfway through inflation of the mattress. Unfortunately, the mattress broke just outside the 30-day return policy, so now I'm stuck with an useless air mattress. Would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: the best air mattress I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why I waited so long to get a double high sleeping bag. This is the best camping/guest sleeping arrangement possible. This air mattress airs up quickly with both the built in pump, and if you happen to be camping with the only pump being a car charger. If you have access to a wall outlet it also deflates just as quickly. It comes with a bag that it fits into nicely. I'd definitely recommend being ready to add more air the first time you air it up, and we find we usually have to add more air after the 1st night of camping to keep it at the level we like.
customer_reviews.author: LizBeth628

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: My mattress was losing air and I called Coleman. We went through the process for a replacement bed and within an hour I received a email stating my replacement order was being processed. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE. UPDATE WHEN I RECEIVED THE REPLACEMENT AIR MATTRESS IT WAS ALSO LOSING AIR. SO I'M IN THE PROCESS OF GETTING ASSITANCE ON THE REPLACEMENT. I'M NOT HAPPY WITH THIS BED. IF I SLEEP ON IT I HAVE TO ADD AIR EVERY 2 HRS. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS BED
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: It is an air mattress and it is not like sleeping on my regular bed
customer_reviews.text: I am currently using this bed for my main bed with my house is being remodeled. After a month I have only had to add air a couple times. It is an air mattress and it is not like sleeping on my regular bed, but it is more comfortable than some of the other ones out there. The groves in the side have help keep my sheets on and that is very nice. It has been holding up well to the extended use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Coleman
customer_reviews.text: My son had another Coleman blow-up bed that he literally wore out over the course of ten years! This one is easy to blow up, comfortable and stores easily in the carryall. He said when he last visited and used the new Coleman that it was the best sleep he has had while visiting us. Thanks for an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great temporary blow up bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great temporary blow up bed. Blows up quickly and deflates quickly. I bought this to use at the in-laws house and have not had any problems with it all the times it has been utilized. The height is a plus! I had an Aero bed previously and it was junk, the bed got a tear in the seam the second time we used it. This is the second Coleman bed I have bought the previous bed I purchased was only 12 inches high and it lasted well over 4 years. For the amount of money I spent on this I would buy the same bed again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this bed and within 2 months it stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed and within 2 months it stopped holding air. I exchanged it for a new one. The bed was used once and put away for a couple months and when taken out for guests it wouldn't hold air. My daughter also purchased this mattress and the same thing happened to hers. Too much money to spend for one time use.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Best air mattress I've ever owned... Better than a more expensive brand that will go unmentioned (think bad infomercials)
customer_reviews.text: I've had more compliments from friends using this than any air mattress should rightfully get. One person can sleep on it w/ no sagging into the middle. 2 people can sleep on it with out driving each other crazy. The vinyl is thick and it has been durable for a year with tons of use. Packs up nicely. Air pump is loud and it's heavy. Primary use should be for home guests not camping. Fiancee and I slept on it for a week when we bought our house and slept like babies. This thing is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJohn107

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent air-bed... Fills very quickly (about 2 minutes). Also has a power deflate setting for rapid deflation... Very comfortable, and the internal structural design prevents the movement of someone who is sleeping when you get in or out of the bed... This is an excellent feature... Great product at a great price...
customer_reviews.author: Rod Macleod

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: First use it worked fine. Second time the expansion they talk about was a total deflation. We re-inflated it 4 times and it still lost air until we were sleeping with our fannies on the floor. Getting a refund is a joke. Amazon won't do anything after 30 days and Coleman says we bought it from Amazon, so Coleman is not responsible. We bought a Glacier's Edge from Fred Meyer and it works every time.
customer_reviews.author: Mad One

customer_reviews.title: Apparently use once and throw away
customer_reviews.text: Used it one time in July and it was great aside from having to periodically add a little air to keep it firm. Would not stay inflated with any weight on it the second time we tried to use it in September. Nothing notable occurred during first use that would explain why. (Of course now we are outside the return window.)
customer_reviews.author: A. Gleason

customer_reviews.title: NOT PLEASED-HAS A LEAK ALREADY
customer_reviews.text: I used it for 5 nites ONLY and less than 6 months later, I needed to use it again & it already had sprung a leak and we can't find the air leak. I'm very disappointed. I live in NJ and bought this and had it directly shipped to my mother's home in NC, so I'll have it to sleep on when I visit. It is very bulky for my mother to box up and ship back to Amazon...so I'll find out their protocol for this type of return, I'll find out if they make good for this product...Or Not. I'll keep you guys posted :(
customer_reviews.author: LT. In NJ

customer_reviews.title: Deflated after two hours, never laid on it
customer_reviews.text: Immediately leaked after the first set up. I struggled finding a air mattress review that didn’t have leaking comments, so I finally went with Coleman and boy was I disappointed. The mattress was set up on my freshly vacuumed, carpeted floor. After two hours it had deflated by 50% and no one had laid on it yet. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Gina Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate...
customer_reviews.text: ***Updated Review*** I received this purchase on 4/7/15, and the air bed lasted less than a month (4/29/15) before I noticed a slow leak developing on the surface of the mattress. Although, it is more durable than other similar air beds that I have tried previously, it did not live up to my expectations. I was very disappointed that I had to end up returning this mattress, but fortunate to receive a full refund. After going through about 4 various brands of air matresses over the past few months, I realize that I should've invested money in buying a conventional box spring mattress instead.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bed!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these beds and they are well worth the money! We love these! It's like sleeping in our own beds while we are camping. We have even put one up for a guest to sleep on and he said it slept better than his own bed at home! Great bed, great price! Love the built in pump and the bags that come with these beds for storing them!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Deflated the first night
customer_reviews.text: This bed deflated the very first night we got it and had a friend sleep on it. She even plugged it in a few times and re-inflated it during the night. I thought this was going to be great because it was compact and was a reasonable price. But I guess you get what you pay for.... I returned mine and got a fox airbed which was a big improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bed Worked Fine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this inflatable bed for an extra guest at Christmas. He said he wasn't comfortable on his side but when he moved to sleep on his back, he slept better. I had no problems setting up or taking down the bed. The pump worked fast. My only problem now is fitting it back into the original packaging. I may need to get a bin or box to store it in. I would purchase this item again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: May not last, see review
customer_reviews.text: Im afraid it will not last, used only a few times and started to notice a slow rate of deflation even though we take good care of. Really like the mattress for our camping needs, but for the money expect it to last at least five years. Products now are made to trash standards.
customer_reviews.author: Faith or Val

customer_reviews.title: ... all my family members who have said it was comfortable - some liked it better than a regular mattress ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not slept in the air mattress but all my family members who have said it was comfortable - some liked it better than a regular mattress that was not their own - only small complaint was in the winter when the mattress was on the floor - my uncle said it was cold under him - so in the winter we put a mattress cover and comforter in it for the person to sleep on and this has fixed the coldness
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Coleman Air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Had friends spend the night on our new air mattress, it went flat!!! Needless to say I was very embarrassed. Checked everything to make sure we did everything right, put air in it during the day and it still went flat again. I didn't expect to receive a gift card credit. I wanted the credit back on my credit card. Not a very happy customer.😖😧
customer_reviews.author: Rhea Linkous

customer_reviews.title: Great for Home and Outdoor Use
customer_reviews.text: High quality construction, durable, and comfortable. The built in pump is very handy but I particularly have a fondness for this design because of the auxiliary valve. Meaning that you can take this camping and fill it up with a hand or 12v pump while the built in is great for in home use. Similarly, the pump does a great job of sucking the air out when deflating but manual deflation is just as easy for the electricity deficient applications.
customer_reviews.author: Murt

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Deflated overnight each time.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Super loud to fill, and it deflated continuously overnight for my partner’s parents. They woke up with bad backs. I felt so bad. Because I got it i’m advance to its use, I could not return it. Don’t take a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Tongpi01

customer_reviews.title: this is the most comfortable air mattress I have ever slept on
customer_reviews.text: this is the most comfortable air mattress I have ever slept on. I only use it when camping. Im 64 years old and it is so hard to get up from the low ones, this is so easy to get in and out of. It stays firm all night long with no air leakage. I have spent so much more money on air mattress in the past few years by getting one and then having to get another for the next year because they don't hold up. So far this is still going strong after several uses.
customer_reviews.author: CJP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different brand of air mattress and it deflated the first time I used it. Stupid me. I should have gone with Coleman in the first place. I'm glad I came to my senses. Easy to set up and take down and it didn't lose any air. Very comfortable night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air!
customer_reviews.text: Used it one time, than after I was finished with it. I had to bring it out again. Filled it up, was deflated the next day. This product sucks big time! The window to return had past. I got it in July 2017, September 1, can't hold air. Must be made in China. Don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicesfguy

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: It does stretch a bit, but that is to be expected. We slept on it a total of 4 nights so far, and it is pretty nice! The built in pump is awesome!!! We will be using it for two more camping trips so I will update as I go. I'll add, I'm 33 weeks pregnant, and this bad boy was not too shabby. Yes, I was very happy to get home to my pillow top king sized bed, but thats obvious. I'm very pleased with this so far. My husband did a good job. We just put a blanket over it, then our sleeping bag. We might get a foam pad if we can find a queen sized one.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskanWoman

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The plug in inflator/deflator is awesome. Flip a switch and it inflates in 5 minutes, flip it the other way and it deflates in 5 minutes. Very comfortable, and easy to break down and transport with the included carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: philip lamontagne

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CHOICE!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about this bed. They were correct in stating that it is easy to inflate and deflate. Having the built in plug to do this was a great choice. The bed is comfortable and stays inflated without problems. The fact that you can deflate it in a matter of minutes a bonus factor. If your thinking of purchasing this bed then all I can say is BUY IT! you won't be disappointed! I know I wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: tmissmolly

customer_reviews.title: A must have air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second one of these air mattresses I have bought. We had the first one for about 6 months we used it almost every day and it popped so when I found it again I bought a new one. To have for camping this summer we LOVE THIS air mattress
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Popped after only 3 days
customer_reviews.text: The bed looks very nice and is very comfortable. In my opinion, if it hadn't popped, I would have said it was well worth the price. However, after only 3 days, it popped. Perhaps I over inflated the bed...perhaps I'm too big for the bed. I don't know the reason why it popped. I called Coleman and their customer service, in my experience, wasn't as great as some of the reviews on here seem to imply. I ended up returned the bed to Amazon, who always impresses me with their customer service. I got a full refund and purchased an Intex air bed for half the price. So far, that bed has worked out far better.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Big, Comfortable, Holds air well, and Recommend it to others
customer_reviews.text: We used a similar Coleman queen size air mattress for several years before it received an unrepairable tear. This model holds air well and is just as comfortable as the one it's replacing. The only downside to the new model is there is no storage for the pump's electrical cord. The old model (also with a built-in pump which I highly recommend) had a little storage space with a cover for the electrical cord so it didn't stick out when replacing in the carrying bag. It would get 5 stars if it wasn't for this missing storage space for the electrical cord. Despite this, I would purchase this product again and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Prescott

customer_reviews.title: As easy as it looks!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with how easy this product was to inflate AND deflate! We didn't waste any time waiting for the mattress to shrink up so we could pack up! Although nothing beats sleeping in your own comfy bed, sleeping on this product was as comfy as sleeping on an air mattress can be!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Top Seams Popped.
customer_reviews.text: TOP Seams ripped apart after 6 night of use. One, 185 pound person sleeping on it. Popped and then I sunk to the floor. Didn't help the self confidence LOL.
customer_reviews.author: KBC

customer_reviews.title: *** STURDY - BEST BY FAR -
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best air mattress. I've purchased a few in the past that did not hold up as well as this coleman. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: SportyMomma71

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress Buy With Confidence
customer_reviews.text: Way better than your old blow up! So much more comfortable and with the ridge around the edge you never feel like you're going to roll off! The inflater part is the bomb too. Doesn't take long to inflate or deflate and sheets etc fit awesome on it. Definitely a "buy" for me Honest P!
customer_reviews.author: Honest P

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy mattress
customer_reviews.text: The mattress inflates very easily and seems very durable, but once fully inflated it is very stiff and was not as comfortable as I had hoped. I tried deflating slightly, but that did not work well with two people sleeping on the mattress. I plan to buy a foam mattress topper to place on it when we have guests visit. Otherwise, it will likely last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Annz

customer_reviews.title: We were excited to spend money on a good, hefty air mattress
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to spend money on a good, hefty air mattress. But after a couple of months it now goes flat throughout the night. We take very good care of it, so I'm not sure how it happened. Very disappointed. It was great when it didn't go flat though.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn F.

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend it. Disappointing since I have had good luck ...
customer_reviews.text: Plans changed after I ordered and didn't get to use until recently. Finally got to use... used for 2 nights and then it started loosing air rapidly though I can't seem to find where the leak is... There is a note on it saying it can loose air due to the material stretching but this is halfway to the floor in a couple hours no matter how many times its filled. Don't recommend it. Disappointing since I have had good luck with Coleman products in the past.
customer_reviews.author: J9O

customer_reviews.title: Best Air Matress
customer_reviews.text: Best Air Matress I've purchased. And I've purchased 5 in the last two years. All of them have deflated and are no longer usable except this one. A+++ purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The pump to set this bed up & refill air is easy to use. Air stays in well & refilling not needed often. Bed is firm, yet fine for short-term sleeping arrangements. Coleman is a consistent brand & this item is what we expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: bride29

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this air mattress for 2 years now, after using it on my last camping trip, I cannot, in good faith recommend this bed to anyone as the internal webbings will come apart and fill the bed balloon shaped, instead of the traditional bed shape. Additionally, the valve for the “quickfill” is leaky. Overnight, youll end up with a deflated bed akin to a loose waterbed.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable but durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable but not the most comfortable. It's held up to a lot of heavy users but it isn't the most comfortable bed to sleep on. As with most air mattresses, it makes a lot of noise when you move and anyone else on the bed feels it. It's really durable which is probably the best part of the bed. Inflation is loud but really the comfort level is the biggest detriment to this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was good but it did last but 14 months with very little use!
customer_reviews.text: We used it once since the purchase in Feb 2019. Our son is home from college due to COVID 19 and he has been sleeping on it for 2 1/2 weeks. One of the pillow tops burst open. We tried to repair with a kit but it did not work. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Malone

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Best air bed ! Love it . I had the bed for over 5years and never had any issues. O nly thing with 3 children jumping on the bed it made a small bump in the middle but never broke. I tak e the bed with us on every vacation ..just throw it on the baggage and enjoy comfortable sleep anywhere. Unfortunately, one of the kids made a small hole which became huge and I had to discard the bed. I will definitely recomend this bed...and ready to get a new one. 5years worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: HILDA

customer_reviews.title: Not Queen sized.
customer_reviews.text: Labeled queen size, but our queen size sheets were much too large. Be sure to get a mattress pad, it’s very cold sleeping on these even in summer. We used these when we moved and were waiting for our furniture. Better than nothing, but I won’t sleep on them again.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Poor experience
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product for the first time and the first time I slept on it, it deflated all the way. I returned it for the same product and it worked after I slept on it once but deflated the second time I used it. I would not personally recommend it. It looked like it would be quality and it is priced for it to be quality but my experience would suggest otherwise. I will be returning this product and be getting a different air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase in a long time. Used it twice in a hotel room and now doesn't hold inflation for entire night. And because past 30 days cannot get refund or return. Not a product use regularly so window for return is irrelevant. Would give less than one star if could. Do not buy this product!!
customer_reviews.author: pat lofaro

customer_reviews.title: This bed is awesome! I've had guests sleep on it multiple times ...
customer_reviews.text: This bed is awesome! I've had guests sleep on it multiple times and it was still nice and firm the next morning. The built-in pump is fast and not extremely loud and you can also use a hand held pump to inflate it. We even took it camping once. Though that was a bad decision because we have a 3 people tent and this bed is humungous. We couldn't inflate it all the way so it kinda felt like we were in a bouncy bounce inside our tent. Haha. But it's great if you use it indoors. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Love it so far! Used it camping twice and it was really comfortable. Since most air mattresses tend to lose some air during the night it's nice to have a double high so your not waking up on the ground. I also used t for guests in my house. They loved it. Every time I used it it had the weight of two people. The plug in inflator is great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Arakaki

customer_reviews.title: Easily punctured
customer_reviews.text: I would think for $150 or so you could line the interior with kevlar. Super easy to do, and at this price point, totally necessary. I never even found the microscopic carpet item that punctured this mattress. Maybe a stray staple? Recommendation: Don't invest in it
customer_reviews.author: Belz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, well made, fills quickly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It fills and empties quickly and it is very comfortable. Seems very robust and well made. The only thing I would change is I would prefer the power cord to be at the head end not the foot. That would make it easier to plug in to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, proven to take the weight limits listed and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy and always feel like i'm going to pop these mattresses. I had a different coleman years ago and this was a littl bit different of a model. I have been extremely happy with the mattress and the quality. There haven't been any slow leaks or any problems so far. Have had as much as 550 lbs sleeping on it and no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: J.Domino

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We needed a queen size inflatable bed and I wasn't going to physically go out on Black Friday for some that I had seen as door busters. I found this one on Amazon and trust the Coleman brand and the price was reasonable so I ordered it. We have used it once and it is reasonably comfortable and the built in electric pump for inflating and deflating is great. The only possible improvement that I can think of is that I saw some competitors that have a recessed compartment to hold the permanently attached power cord which the Coleman doesn't have. Not a deal breaker though and I am delighted with the Coleman product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Starr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: We have now owned this for over 1 year and it has been used several times. The pump works well to both inflate and deflate the bed. It folds easily and fits the case it comes in for compact storage and travel.The mattress is very firm and does not lose air even over several days of use. It is very comfortable. However, in the winter we have put a heavier mattress cover or a throw between the mattress and the fitted sheet because otherwise it felt a bit cold to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for a spare room!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is fantastic for my spare room, I can plug it in, inflate it and then when the guests leave it has an option to deflate itself and it goes into the closet! It is a true Queen size, my queen sheets fit with no issues. One note: I'm sure this applies to all air mattresses but it was new to me, I don't keep my house very warm at night and my guests ended up really cold in the morning as the air under them wasn't too warm. Oops! An extra blanket between them and the mattress solved the problem but it wasn't something that ever crossed my mind when getting an air mattress for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Bunnita

customer_reviews.title: Slept great on our camping trip
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement mattress for our previous one which was fair enough on comfort. (It went missing so we needed another for an upcoming camping trip.) Was I ever surprised at how comfortable this new one was and how well I slept. I had a nasty cold during the camping trip and still felt as if I had a good night sleep. And believe me, we are spoiled! At home we have a high quality very comfortable regular mattress on our bed. I highly recommend this mattress for any needs be they camping or as a guest bed at home.
customer_reviews.author: L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: The pump on the product we used was defective - the knob did not line up with the appropriate settings so inflate actually deflated it and we had to turn past that to get it to come close to inflating.
customer_reviews.author: motherof3

customer_reviews.title: Big Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: This bed works perfectly for us! I used it for the first time when guests came over the winter holidays, and they said it sleeps just as well as the bed in the guest room and one even said it is more comfortable! I bought the mattress pad too but I don't think it is necessary, it has a nice flannel covering. The pump inflated it in no time and it stayed fully inflated overnight. I haven't tried it for longer yet, but it would be simple to add a little more air. Give this bed a HUGE THUMBS UP!
customer_reviews.author: Dogluvr

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Comfortable Air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Used it several occasions so far and found it to be very comfortable. Build quality is high. Had to take off 1-star because like all air mattresses it needs to be reinflated after a few hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Laskaris

customer_reviews.title: What you expect from a Coleman
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and nice height. I used it daily for about a month and it sprung a leak. I don't think daily use is what it's intended for, so can't really fault Coleman for that. But it would have been nice if it had lasted longer for the price. I didn't attempt to contact for repair, so can't say what they would have done.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy H

customer_reviews.title: Works well initially, then no more
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Dec. 2016, and have only used it on 3 occasions. It worked well the first 2 times, and was quite comfy. This 3rd time, though, it won’t hold air and deflates significantly throughout the night (we re-inflated once during the night, and needed to do so twice but were too tired). There’s no obvious air leak, so I’m assuming it’s seeping out either through the seams or the valve.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Lu

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable and set up and take down is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable and set up and take down is a breeze. Holds air very well. We use this to go camping and we do not have to add any air throughout the weekend which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I used it four times. The third time, it started deflating on its' own just like other reviewers said. My reason for purchasing the item was to get me through an out of state move so I could have something to sleep on while my things were in transit. It did the job for those few nights and saved me the cost of a hotel, so in that respect it was worth it. But don't buy this if you expect to use it as a guest bed as it will conk out on you pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: angelicamb

customer_reviews.title: Great for visitors.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's new house for when he has extra company. Nice height off the ground. You can pick the firmness by how much air to put in it. He said filling it up was very quick and easy. Only negative was it seemed to lose a little air after the first night that it was used by an average size adult. Easy to re-fill, but may not hold the firmness night after night. Haven't tested it too much beyond that. I was told the person who slept on it thought it was very comfortable. I got the queen size, so any adult could use it or a couple. Overall, very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jo A.

customer_reviews.title: Coleman is always a great brand.
customer_reviews.text: My previous air mattress was a Coleman and I had it for about 10 years, until I recently left it on a vacation. But this one is even better with the built in inflater and deflater, it makes it so much easier. It's comfortable and holds the air.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Sharyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great air mattress! Not quite as high as I thought it would be but still easy to get in and out for my 70+ dad. He has a bad back and this was comfortable, no complaints. Looses a bit of air over a day or so but not bad. Great price, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the built in pump!
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy this last minute for a trip out of town. I always had an air mattress that needed a pump, and every time we used it I swore the next one we purchased would NOT need a separate pump! Well that one popped, so we bought this. Its great, rolls up small, and is pretty comfortable. Cant beat the convenience of the built in pump either.
customer_reviews.author: amazonlove

customer_reviews.title: Excellent air bed
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, firm, easy to use. I like the velvety layer on top..it holds the sheet in place. My husband & I used it for one week @ our daughters and slept well. Just firmed it up a little with the every night with the pump, probably just stretched a little, no leaking. We are about 350 lbs all together and it held firm.
customer_reviews.author: sandy mintern

customer_reviews.title: MADE VERY WELL
customer_reviews.text: THIS ONE IS MADE VERY WELL, THICK MATERIAL. I HAVE NOT BEEN THE ONE TO SLEEP ON IT, BUT HAVE HAD A GUEST USE IT TWICE SINCE DECEMBER AND HE LIKES IT ALOT. EASY TO FILL/TAKE OUT AIR. QUALITY PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: lenaapple1974

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed, just disappointed that the pump failed and it developed a leak after only 2 yrs of  intermittent use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 years ago. Only used occasionally. Pump stopped working a while back so I had to use a hair dryer to add air. Now it has a slow leak so we've had to throw it away. The bed was comfortable while it lasted but giving it three stars because it failed sooner that I would have liked given the number of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for an air mattress that doesn't deflate while sleeping ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for an air mattress that doesn't deflate while sleeping on it either. Made of pretty good quality material too. Our lab seems to jump on it every time it is inflated yet it hasn't been punctured by her nails.
customer_reviews.author: jcarter1033

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this air mattress for just over 1 week and I have no complaints. Inflates quick and easy. The mattress keeps air all night and throughout the day. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Miss B

customer_reviews.title: Good construction
customer_reviews.text: We bought this 3 years ago and it's still going strong. Easy to inflate and deflate. Packages nicely for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty great, it blows up quickly and feels very nice to lay on. The inner supports make this thing feel closer to a real bed than an air bed. The built in pump that also reverses to help decompress is also great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: I loved not having to pump up this bed manually. The imbedded pump worked just fine. I used this bed for two weeks straight and never had to refill the air bed. It easily supported 400 pounds when it was being used as a couch as well. The quality of the bed lining on the top was very comfortable...all I needed was a sheet. My only complaint is that I may have put in too much air, because this mattress was very firm and it took a couple of days for my back to adjust (I have a bad back). I have owned it/used it for a month.
customer_reviews.author: LadyTessa77

product_meta.title: Coleman SupportRest Elite PillowStop Double-High Airbed
product_meta.description: Let your guests sleep as wonderfully as they do in their own bed with a Coleman SupportRest Elite Pillow Top Double High Airbed. They'll fall into absolute comfort with the luxurious pillow top. The antimicrobial treated sleep surface resists odor, mold, mildew and fungus from forming on the product, so you can offer a bed to your friends and family with confidence.
feature_bullets: Portable air mattress with leak-free construction for indoor and outdoor use
AirTight system with PillowStop design keeps air bed inflated and pillows in place
Antimicrobial sleeping surface resists odor, mold, mildew, and fungus
SwiftRise120-volt built-in air pump included for quick inflation and deflation
Fits standard queen sheets and supports up to 600 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
